string.name: desc
string.value: Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A specially-made sky-blue wooden chair that's only available in Lith Harbor. Recover 35 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, plush green chair, complete with arm-rests. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, plush red chair, complete with arm-rests.. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds. Perfect for a quick break from training.

string.name: desc
string.value: Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds. Perfect for a quick break from training.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, plush yellow chair, complete with arm-rests. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable pink cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 60 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable blue cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 60 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Rumored to be crafted in Amoria, this special chair is also known as the Love Seat. Recover 20 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable white cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 50 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair crafted by Jacob. Recovers 75 HP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful chair used often on the battlefield. Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair straight from the relaxation experts in Florina Beach. Recover 20 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A light, stylish chair that seems to be sent from the heavens. Recover 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with magical properties crafted in Ellinia. Restores 35 MP per 10 Seconds while sitting.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable grey cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 60 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable gold cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers MP 60 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beach chair placed in the shades under the palm tree at Ariant. Sit on it to recover HP 40 and MP 20 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A specially-made chair that's only available in Mushroom Shrine. Recover 60 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A white chair commemorating the 4th anniversary of MapleStory. Sit on it to recover HP 35 and MP 10 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit in the shade of a large lotus leaf! A cute doll hangs off the edge. Recovers 200 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small figurine embedded with a gem that emanates heroism. This item allows you to activate and use the Heroic Statues in the Valley of Heroes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This map marks the hidden paths of Phantom Forest, which are now open to you.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical stone that unlocks the gates to the Inner Sanctum of Crimsonwood Keep.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pair of luck dish out of bamboos. Common in Korean culture

string.name: desc
string.value: A red luck sack common in Korean culture.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pair of luck sack made of bamboo.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red luck sack with 'luck' written on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: An alphabet "A" made out of pasta. Gather up other alphabets, and bring them all to the Maple Administrator.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A small candle from the Admin. This candle will turn itself off when the game is ended.

string.name: desc
string.value: A candle used on the birthday cake for the 4th anniversary of Maplestory. The flame will be blown out when the player exits the game and lit again upon returning to the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair hand-crafted by Stirgeman for aspiring superheroes! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair crafted within the Phantom Forest, complete with...ornaments...from unlucky travelers. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair made out of Ice Queen's ice pieces. Sit on it to recover HP 40 and MP 30 per 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mr. Oh sells these rare spices at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can find these memorabilia from Thailand at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lena sells delicious unagi at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: This taxydermy shark, handmade by Tae Gong himself, can be found at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hanako sells this exquisite at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A memory chip Agent W left with me. Information regarding 'Master M' is said to be contained in it. If I don't enter the secret code every hour, it will self-destruct.

string.name: desc
string.value: Inferno will comfort your body. Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Abyss will comfort your mind. Recovers 60 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The chair in which the chiefs of the Miwok tribe sat. If you sit in this chair, you can receive the strength of the Miwok ancestors and recover 65MP in 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small candle given by Cassandra. This candle will turn off automatically when the game ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: You will recover 50 HP every 10 seconds. Perhaps, as you recline, you will find the answer to many of life's questions.

string.name: desc
string.value: You will recover 50 HP every 10 seconds. You will experience the might of a conqueror after recovery.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair makes you feel like you're sitting in the lap of luxury. Also recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A white chair created to celebrate Maple Story's 5th Anniversary. Sit on it to restore 35 HP and 10 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that restores HP every 10 seconds when used. It's very strong since it was made from bamboo grown on Rien.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pretty cushion shaped like a moon. Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 60 HP is restored every 10 seconds if you lean back on this cute Male Desert Rabbit Cushion.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pink beach chair that makes you want to go to the beach. Restores 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A luxurious velvet sofa dyed with a beautiful shade of navy. Restores 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A designer chair that glows with a passionate red. Restores 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Giant Star that Cassandra made for you. If you hold it during the Starlight Festival, you can receive 1 Star Stamp every hour. \n#cDisappears when you log out of the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter N that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter E that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter W that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter S that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maple Leaf that signifies Maple Story's 5 year journey. Something good will happen if you hold onto it for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: An unknown being that has yet to be explained.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit on the Halloween Broomstick Chair, 50 MP is restored every 10 seconds

string.name: desc
string.value: When you rest on the Shinsoo, 50 HP and 50 MP are restored every 10 seconds

string.name: desc
string.value: An eerie looking chair that resembles Olivia. Recovers 40 HP and 35 MP every 10 seconds

string.name: desc
string.value: A new chair to recline and relax in throughout the Thanksgiving holiday.\nRecovers 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A new chair that makes you feel like a Rock Star.\nRecovers 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair shaped like a musical note. Recovers 100 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A solid ice crystal that contains Maha Charm. Hold onto it for one hour and the crystal will melt, enabling you to acquire the Charm.

string.name: desc
string.value: A charm that contains protection from Maha, the spirit of Polearm. Take this to Cassandra for a chance to answer questions and receive prizes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A huge X-mas Gift Box big enough to fit a grownup. It has a message that reads, "I am here for you." Sitting in it will recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cushion that resembles Pink Bean, the underling of the Black Mage. Leaning against the cushion and resting will recover 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cuddling with the Polar Bear for some cozy, comfy rest will recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with a big umbrella. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Snuggle up with Aran's loyal mount, Ryko, to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lean back on this imposing Tiger Skin Chair to restore 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: There is a swing on the Persimmon Tree with ripe persimmons.

string.name: desc
string.value: 방석에 앉으면 빨간 상모를 쓴 귀여운 월묘의 재주를 볼 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 방석에 앉으면 파란 상모를 쓴 귀여운 월묘의 재주를 볼 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 방석에 앉으면 부채를 들고 줄타기를 하는 월묘의 재주를 볼 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 방석에 앉으면 혼신의 힘을 다해 연주하는 월묘를 볼 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold onto the Broomstick so you don't fall off.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sink yourself into this heavenly cake chair next to someone else who owns it as well, and watch it create a scrumptious effect! Mmm, this chair is so delicious you'll recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yummy! Use this chair next to someone else who's also using it, and a mouth-watering chocolate fondue appears. Smack your lips and dream about treats as you recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Perch yourself on the hand of this powerful yellow robot to recover 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 카산드라의 PC방 왕별이 들어있는 상자다. 90분 동안 잘 가지고 있으면, 카산드라의 PC방 왕별로 변한다. 접속종료하면 사라져 버린다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 카산드라가 찾고 있는 PC방 왕별이다. 접속종료하면 사라져버린다.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong wooden chair personally crafted by Gustav. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this cracked dragon egg shell and relax to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this baby dragon swing to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold onto this for 30 minutes and the cold weather will turn it into slush. It's so delicate it will disappear if you log out.

string.name: desc
string.value: Give it to Cassandra before it disappears!

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon Egg that Cassandra has left in your care. You must hold it close and keep it warm for one hour for it to hatch. Logging out will cause it to be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon that hatched from the egg Cassandra left with you. Return it to Cassandra to receive a reward!

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this Easter Egg Basket for a sweet thrill of happiness.\nRecovers 40 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds while resting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that resembles Balrog, an ancient demon that is rumored to be found deep inside Sleepywood Dungeon. When you sit in this menacing chair, 60 HP and 60 MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that resembles Zakum, a monster that is worshipped by residents near the volcanic area. When you sit in this chair, you'll feel the power of Zakum. 80 HP and 50 MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that resembles Horntail, an evil three-headed dragon that lives in Leafre's Dragon Forest. When you sit on a Horntail Chair, your injuries will heal quicker. 100 HP and 40 MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this chair to feel the warmth from the furnace. You can recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Snuggle up in this cozy polar bear chair to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this Soul Teddy chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this Lord Pirate chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Relax in this cozy teddy bear bed to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enjoy a bath and relax in this spacious wooden tub to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Stay in this igloo made out of ice and snow to recover 40 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Relax in this mochi ice cream chair to recover 30 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty compass that will eventually be used to make a Golden Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take a break by sitting on this floating chair to recover 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Take a break by leaning on the Stone Golem Hand to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take a break by leaning on the Dragon Skull Chair to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that symbolizes the authority of a chief. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with the romantic scent of roses. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with an adorable yet lazy panda chewing a bamboo stick. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with a fuzzy kitty rubbing its face on its body. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that provides you the full wilderness experience. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A white chair made to commemorate the beginning of MapleStory. You can recover 35 HP and 10 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Construction Site North of Kerning City

string.name: desc
string.value: A black feather from a bird that has not been identified. Keep an eye on it for 15 minutes and it will transform into a Bright Feather.\n#cIt will disappear once you log out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A bright feather from a bird that has not been identified. Take it over to the Maple Admin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Hawkeye sticker. Collect all 5 Cygnus Knights stickers to receive a limited reward.

string.name: desc
string.value: It takes 2 hours for the sand in Carta's Sandglass to trickle down to the bottom.

string.name: desc
string.value: The sand in Carta's Sandglass has trickled down to the bottom.

string.name: desc
string.value: An Oz sticker. Collect all 5 Cygnus Knights stickers to receive a limited reward.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that will allow you to enjoy camping even more. It recovers 40 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic chair that people in Neo City ride. It recovers 40 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic chair that people in Neo City ride. It recovers 40 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A maple tree with a hanging swing. You can recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair made by modifying the machine the Visitor Representative used to ride. Sit on it and 50 HP and MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Maple Admin will exchange 9 of these for a random chocolate.

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain a special item by summoning the Dragon Lord after collecting all 9 types of chocolates.

string.value: A special chair shaped like the Dragon Lord. Recovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special chair shaped like Sheep. Recovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special chair shaped like Owl. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: This chair is shaped like the MWLB mascot. MWLB members can use this chair to regain 20 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Friends are always valuable. Recovers 40 HP and 40 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely kitten makes you happy. Recover 40 HP and 40 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Winter is coming. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hug me tightly. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sitting this chair, you can count how many stars are in the sky. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can predict your future with this chair. Recover 40 HP and 40 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scary witch follows you for trick or treat! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can be artistic with this chair. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Moment of elegance. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Need some privacy? Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Time to heal your wound. Recovers 100 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 40 HP is restored every 10 seconds if you lean back on this cute Sand Bunny Cushion.

string.name: desc
string.value: 50 HP is restored every 10 seconds if you lean back on this music box.
